video.title: Flor Salvaje
video.synopsis: A young orphaned woman moves to a new town to raise her sisters and struggles to carve her own destiny as several different men vie for her love.

episodes.synopsis: After a tragedy, Amanda and her sisters are abandoned by their father. Separated from the girls, Amanda decides to look for work at a brothel.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Zahra discovers that Amanda is pure and decides to prepare her for Rafael.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Amanda may become Rafael’s exclusive woman and finds out she shares a tragic past with one of the girls.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Amanda decides to go looking for her sisters and makes a deal that will change her life.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Sacramento is determined to win Amanda over, but he doesn’t know about her pact with Rafael.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Sacramento defies Rafael in a confrontation that gets him in trouble with the authorities.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Zahra prepares Amanda for her initiation with Rafael.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Amanda is happy to be reunited with her sisters, and she has to fulfill her promise to Rafael, but Sacramento tries to make her change her mind.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Amanda makes her debut. Will she be able to escape her fate?
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Amanda follows Road Runner’s advice to become Flor Salvaje.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Clara discovers Mariano’s betrayal. Amanda cries over her lost innocence.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Clara’s death impacts everyone at the Consuelo brothel. Amanda arrives in time to save Ana.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Sacramento gets sick and can only think of Amanda as she struggles to raise her sister without letting Rafael control her.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Pablo promises Sacramento he’ll look for Amanda, but will he be able to deliver the message?
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Pablo and Flor’s passion has taken over them from the moment they laid eyes on each other, and she risks Rafael’s wrath to be with him.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Zahra surprises everyone during a party, and a fire puts Amanda’s life in danger.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Amanda is miraculously saved from the fire. Pablo and the oil workers keep the women from ending up in jail.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Amanda goes with Pablo to the river, and Zahra sleeps with Rafael to cover for her.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Amanda discovers Sacramento’s lies, and he finds out his friend Pablo broke his promise.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Pablo and Sacramento face off over Amanda’s love, and Zahra regrets past mistakes.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Rafael gives a vote of confidence when Pablo is promoted at the oil company and lets Sacramento go.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Sacramento and Pablo are workmates, but the rivalry for Amanda has them on the brink. Meanwhile, she’s determined to run away with Pablo.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Pablo asks Amanda for time to flee from Nueva Esperanza. Mariano kidnaps Malicia, and Ana asks her father for refuge.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Mariano’s obsession with Rocío drives him to horrible things after finding out her secret identity. Rafael suspects Flor is in love.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Mariano tries to cover up his crime and his sister’s profession. Zahra protects Amanda from Rafael’s wrath.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Sacramento confronts Rafael at the bar and the gas station. Zahra tries to get Rocío out of the asylum.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Consuelo’s girls support the oil workers’ strike. Catalina manages to be with Sacramento.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Pablo shows Amanda that his escape plan is well underway. Zahra has a suggestion for Rafael.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Zahra tells Amanda to fall in love with Rafael. He tries to win her over with a gift that amazes her.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Everything’s ready for Ana’s auction. Malicia becomes Mariano Guerrero’s next victim.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Rafael wins Ana’s auction, and Flor shows her gratitude for getting her house back.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Amanda finds out Pablo hasn’t told the whole truth. Sacramento is visibly disappointed in Amanda.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Everyone fears for Amanda’s life after Pablo’s betrayal, but she’s willing to become a new person.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Flor uses the hatred she feels for Pablo to become the best. Catalina is excited to find out she cares about Sacramento.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Amanda prepares for the party as the girls are put in jail.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Catalina humiliates Amanda at the party with the governor and gets locked up with the 4P girls.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Amanda and Zhara face off over the administration of the 4P. Lucía looks for Rafael to rat out Pablo and Flor.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Zhara curses Amanda and sentences her to a life of unhappiness after being evicted from her home and the bar.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Managing the bar is a big job for Flor. Catalina is clearly willing to do whatever it takes to get rid of Rafael.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Mariano looks for those responsible for the attack against Rafael. At the bar, nothing seems to be going Flor’s way.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Mariano surprises Amanda and Pablo. Rafael is suspicious of Catalina. The girls compete to appear in the radio show.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Pablo declares his love for Flor in front of everyone during the reopening of the 4P.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: The pain Lucía feels leads her to tell Rafael about the relationship between her husband and Amanda.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Rafael is convinced of Pablo and Amanda’s betrayal. Malicia confronts Enrique for his lies.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Urrieta locks Flor up and takes Pablo. Sacramento and Zahra try desperately to find them.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Rafael kills Pablo to punish Amanda and condemns her to a life without her love.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Sacramento releases Flor from her imprisonment. Rafael is in jail as the prime suspect.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Rafael is imprisoned. Amanda is resentful and wants revenge. Meanwhile, Road Runner gets some bad news.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Catalina becomes a powerful person at the oil company. Sacramento just wants to protect Amanda.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Amanda accepts that Pablo is gone. The same isn’t the case for Malicia, who doesn’t want to accept that Enrique is no longer hers.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Amanda watches Ana’s debut at the 4P. She’s determined to run away with Sacramento, who proposes to her.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Amanda says yes to Sacramento’s proposal. Ana makes a traumatic entrance into the office.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: In anger, Rafael sets the 4P on fire. Amanda and Sacramento manage to escape.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Sacramento and Amanda start their marriage off on the wrong foot. Zahra and Francisco go on a honeymoon.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Mariano moves into the Urrietas’ house. Amanda can’t stop thinking about Pablo. Sacramento can’t find a job.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Sacramento and Amanda flee from Rafael. Mariano and Rocío go head to head in a political campaign.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Amanda ends her period of mourning, making Sacramento jealous. Rafael feels insecure about his impotency issue.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Rafael suffers an accident in his truck. Malicia cuts Piruetas with a bottle.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Rafael survives the accident. Sacramento defends Amanda’s honor, but it costs him his job.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Amanda tries to kill Rafael, and at the same time tries to give herself to Sacramento.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: Amanda finally gives in and lets Sacramento love her. Ana tries to take her place by Rafael’s side.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: Rafael returns to the ranch with Ana. Amanda and Sacramento take care of the restaurant.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: Mariano plays a dirty trick on his sister during the debate. Sacramento and Amanda achieve success in their business.
episodes.title: Episode 63

episodes.synopsis: Rafael is consumed with hatred and takes it out on Catalina.
episodes.title: Episode 64

episodes.synopsis: Raimundo confesses to his family that Sacramento is his son. Amanda confronts her husband for hiding Catalina’s visit.
episodes.title: Episode 65

episodes.synopsis: Brígida’s confession costs Raimundo his life. Sacramento manages to escape from Rafael and his men again.
episodes.title: Episode 66

episodes.synopsis: The women of the Consuelo brothel arrive to console Brígida. Amanda disappears mysteriously.
episodes.title: Episode 67

episodes.synopsis: Zahra convinces Amanda not to rescue her sister. Alicia finds an ally in Abelardo.
episodes.title: Episode 68

episodes.synopsis: Amanda helps Alicia get over her addiction. Zahra receives a tempting proposal from Francisco.
episodes.title: Episode 69

episodes.synopsis: Rafael poisons Catalina and decides to support Rocío’s political campaign to get under Mariano’s skin.
episodes.title: Episode 70

episodes.synopsis: Catalina is surprised by her condition and calls Sacramento to let him know.
episodes.title: Episode 71

episodes.synopsis: Raimundo’s will leaves his fortune to his children, including Sacramento. Dudi’s carelessness brings Rafael closer to Flor.
episodes.title: Episode 72

episodes.synopsis: Rafael finds Amanda and kisses her passionately. Sacramento has a fit of jealousy.
episodes.title: Episode 73

episodes.synopsis: Amanda confesses that what she wants is revenge against Rafael and she feels tied to him for life.
episodes.title: Episode 74

episodes.synopsis: Mariano wins the election fraudulently. Zahra withdraws, and Mina is now in charge of the bar.
episodes.title: Episode 75

episodes.synopsis: Enrique gets married in an attempt to get over Alicia. A shootout leaves several people injured.
episodes.title: Episode 76

episodes.synopsis: Rafael moves into the bar for good, but the girls have to find another line of work.
episodes.title: Episode 77

episodes.synopsis: The restaurant is destroyed in a fire. Sacramento and Amanda’s relationship is falling apart because of Catalina’s pregnancy.
episodes.title: Episode 78

episodes.synopsis: Sacramento ends up in jail on allegations of drug trafficking. Amanda feels guilty.
episodes.title: Episode 79

episodes.synopsis: Amanda feels like she’s running out of options when she finds out Rafael was the one who burned the restaurant.
episodes.title: Episode 80

episodes.synopsis: Amanda returns to New Hope with revenge on the mind. Enrique returns with a pretext so he can see Alicia.
episodes.title: Episode 81

episodes.synopsis: Amanda publicly scorns her sisters, and Sacramento makes a deal with Rafael.
episodes.title: Episode 82

episodes.synopsis: Sacramento insults Amanda. Meanwhile, Enrique finds out what Alicia’s been through.
episodes.title: Episode 83

episodes.synopsis: Amanda has become a new woman. Enrique finds Alicia and finds out she’s not even a shadow of the woman she used to be.
episodes.title: Episode 84

episodes.synopsis: Flor is attacked by Ana. Alicia turns to drink. Inés gives everyone a bad impression of José María.
episodes.title: Episode 85

episodes.synopsis: A shootout leaves an innocent woman injured. Flor prepares her arsenal of seduction.
episodes.title: Episode 86

episodes.synopsis: Ana fakes a suicide attempt. Inés makes José María think she’s going to join a convent.
episodes.title: Episode 87

episodes.synopsis: Amanda renounces her sisters under pressure from Sacramento.
episodes.title: Episode 88

episodes.synopsis: The oil workers protest at the park over the closure of the 4P. Amanda tells Rafael he’ll never have her.
episodes.title: Episode 89

episodes.synopsis: The struggle for the Rojases’ lands reaches the courts. Rafael and Mariano come to blows.
episodes.title: Episode 90

episodes.synopsis: Alicia and Diana face off. Meanwhile, Flor prepares for the reopening of the 4P.
episodes.title: Episode 91

episodes.synopsis: Amanda is going insane with passion for Rafael. Zahra warns her of the risks.
episodes.title: Episode 92

episodes.synopsis: Rafael and Flor meet at the river. Ana interrupts them, just as Amanda planned.
episodes.title: Episode 93

episodes.synopsis: Rafael is determined to make Flor want him. Zahra warns him she’ll end up in love with him.
episodes.title: Episode 94

episodes.synopsis: Rafael asks Flor to save him. Catalina starts having contractions.
episodes.title: Episode 95

episodes.synopsis: Flor sleeps with Rafael Urrieta. Alicia starts drinking again.
episodes.title: Episode 96

episodes.synopsis: Flor sets a plan in motion to get revenge, but her heart is in torment.
episodes.title: Episode 97

episodes.synopsis: Sacramento will never be the same again.
episodes.title: Episode 98

episodes.synopsis: The kids protest and then have fun with the 4P girls.
episodes.title: Episode 99

episodes.synopsis: Rafael and Sacramento become business partners.
episodes.title: Episode 100

episodes.synopsis: Everyone gets ready for the reopening of the 4P.
episodes.title: Episode 101

episodes.synopsis: Sacramento and Rafael face off in a duel to see who gets to spend the night with Flor Salvaje.
episodes.title: Episode 102

episodes.synopsis: Amanda is kidnapped, and Rocío is a victim of her captors.
episodes.title: Episode 103

episodes.synopsis: Rafael rescues Amanda. José María finds Rocío badly injured.
episodes.title: Episode 104

episodes.synopsis: Catalina confesses that she planned the attack against Flor Salvaje along with Lourdes.
episodes.title: Episode 105

episodes.synopsis: Amanda cries in front of Rafael over the guilt she feels for loving him.
episodes.title: Episode 106

episodes.synopsis: Amanda wants to return to Pablo’s tomb. Zahra agrees to marry Francisco.
episodes.title: Episode 107

episodes.synopsis: Abel returns to become Nueva Esperanza’s worst nightmare.
episodes.title: Episode 108

episodes.synopsis: Rafael takes Amanda to a secret place and shows her Pablo’s grave.
episodes.title: Episode 109

episodes.synopsis: Rafael reveals the location of Pablo’s body as proof that he loves Flor.
episodes.title: Episode 110

episodes.synopsis: Catalina and Diana face off over Sacramento. Abel awakens intrigue in Zahra and Rafael.
episodes.title: Episode 111

episodes.synopsis: Flor Salvaje defends Rafael when the trial against him begins.
episodes.title: Episode 112

episodes.synopsis: Rafael asks Flor not to wait for him and to go on with her life.
episodes.title: Episode 113

episodes.synopsis: The girls throw Zahra a bachelorette party.
episodes.title: Episode 114

episodes.synopsis: A photo from the past ruins Zahra and Francisco’s wedding celebration.
episodes.title: Episode 115

episodes.synopsis: Abel gets his revenge against his mother in the middle of the wedding.
episodes.title: Episode 116

episodes.synopsis: Mariano looks for the killer. Zahra confronts Abel.
episodes.title: Episode 117

episodes.synopsis: Rafael is implicated in Francisco’s death. Amanda suspects Abel.
episodes.title: Episode 118

episodes.synopsis: Rafael takes a beating. Johnny is tortured by Rufino.
episodes.title: Episode 119

episodes.synopsis: A silver bullet awakens Rafael’s suspicions. José María agrees to marry Inés.
episodes.title: Episode 120

episodes.synopsis: Sacramento follows the clues to discover Abel’s true intentions.
episodes.title: Episode 121

episodes.synopsis: Abel pretends to be the savior of the people. Rocío is devastated to find out José María is getting married.
episodes.title: Episode 122

episodes.synopsis: Zahra and Filomena face off over Francisco’s remains. Sacramento hears his son’s heartbeat.
episodes.title: Episode 123

episodes.synopsis: Abel brings out hatred in Lucía and guilt in Flor Salvaje.
episodes.title: Episode 124

episodes.synopsis: Rafael Urrieta is in serious condition in the hospital after getting shot by Lucía.
episodes.title: Episode 125

episodes.synopsis: Rafael recovers, but the demonic Abel pursues him.
episodes.title: Episode 126

episodes.synopsis: Abel makes Amanda a proposal. Sacramento is starting to trust Rafael.
episodes.title: Episode 127

episodes.synopsis: Amanda gives in to bitterness and decides to be with Abel out of spite.
episodes.title: Episode 128

episodes.synopsis: Abel keeps sowing terror throughout the town.
episodes.title: Episode 129

episodes.synopsis: Sacramento manages to save Catalina and the two are reunited.
episodes.title: Episode 130

episodes.synopsis: Rafael is out of the hospital and preparing his assault on Abel.
episodes.title: Episode 131

episodes.synopsis: Inés gets cold feet at the wedding.
episodes.title: Episode 132

episodes.synopsis: Rafael and Sacramento reconcile.
episodes.title: Episode 133

episodes.synopsis: Rafael and Abel come to blows.
episodes.title: Episode 134

episodes.synopsis: Zahra tells Rafael that Abel is her son.
episodes.title: Episode 135

episodes.synopsis: Rafael sees Flor and Abel together.
episodes.title: Episode 136

episodes.synopsis: Amanda rejects Abel’s love and compares him with Rafael.
episodes.title: Episode 137

episodes.synopsis: Amanda realizes Rafael didn’t lie to her.
episodes.title: Episode 138

episodes.synopsis: Abel takes off his mask and plans more murders.
episodes.title: Episode 139

episodes.synopsis: Rafael finds Amanda swimming in the river.
episodes.title: Episode 140

episodes.synopsis: Rafael and Amanda get in a fight, both of them mad with jealousy.
episodes.title: Episode 141

episodes.synopsis: Rafael regrets his refusal to accept his son.
episodes.title: Episode 142

episodes.synopsis: Catalina suffers serious complications during the birth.
episodes.title: Episode 143

episodes.synopsis: Rafael confesses to Amanda that he loves her.
episodes.title: Episode 144

episodes.synopsis: Amanda and Rafael give themselves to each other passionately.
episodes.title: Episode 145

episodes.synopsis: Rafael proposes to Flor Salvaje.
episodes.title: Episode 146

episodes.synopsis: Rafael and Sacramento set about rescuing Malicia and Enrique.
episodes.title: Episode 147

episodes.synopsis: Flor and Rafael plan for their wedding.
episodes.title: Episode 148

episodes.synopsis: Abel kidnaps several women during the wedding.
episodes.title: Episode 149

episodes.synopsis: A tragic confrontation occurs between Rafael and Abel.
episodes.title: Episode 150
